acf.description: We won the Deloitte Fast 50 award for the fastest-growing tech company in Central and Eastern Europe and are looking for new colleagues to join us in advancing our project! Seize the opportunity and become a part of the rapidly growing startup FTMO.com. We are searching for a new team member for our marketing department. The ideal candidate has experience in motion graphics, an interest in financial markets, and excellent English language skills.

expectations.title: Creating interactive content for traders worldwide across online platforms, reaching millions of viewers.
Presenting ideas or proposals to a broad audience and collaborating with team members to enhance them.
Providing explanation and support for our product through the use of modern video content.
Contributing to the promotion of our established brand.
Exploring new opportunities and continuously advancing your skills.
Preparing all animation elements for composition, including delivery in specified formats.
With professional video, audio, and lighting setups, our multifunctional recording studio allows us to use all modern marketing techniques. There are no boundaries for your creativity.

knowledge.title: A sense of motion flow composition.
Knowledge and experience with programs: Figma, Adobe After Effects, Adobe Premiere. Experience with 3D graphics is a big advantage.
Initiative, creativity, own ideas, and independence.
Absolute reliability and the ability to manage your own time effectively.
Previous experience in a similar position is welcome. We would like to see your portfolio/showreel.
Remaining calm under pressure, being able to perform multiple tasks at once, prioritize the most important tasks first, and meet deadlines.
Synchronizing visual elements with audio and voiceover tracks.
Working collaboratively with another animator on extensive animation projects.
Communicating effectively, work as part of a team. Ideally, you have a portfolio of related work across several creative projects.
